channel.title: Beta Distribution on Mark LeBoeuf
channel.description: Recent content in Beta Distribution on Mark LeBoeuf

item.title: Choosing a Fantasy Football Quarterback
item.description: Aaron Rodgers or Tom Brady? Carson Wentz or Drew Brees? Choosing the right Fantasy Football QB each week is challenging. To remove some of the guesswork from the decision-making process, I devised an approach that’s worked well over the past few seasons. Read on to learn more about using the Beta Distribution to pick your weekly starting QB.
